attributes.action: NOT STAY IN POSITION FOR MORE THAN 5 YEARS (MAXIMUM)
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Sign below if you think that there a maximum length of time on how long you can be a Prime Minister, like His Tonyness. I have said 5 years as the maximum.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
